――精密検査で確認されたこの世界の基準と異なる身体データ。\n彼女たちが口にする:
—Physical data that differed from this world's standards, confirmed through a thorough examination.
The unknown terms the girls used were "eishi" and "tactical aircraft."
そして、ザルトゥームに存在しない技術と資材によって\n建造されたＭＧとは似て非な:
And with technology and materials that don't exist in zartum
A mobile weapon that looks nothing like the MG they built...
――これらの事実から、我々はあなた達を\n『異なる世界からの来訪者』と結論づけま:
—With all these facts, we have no choice but to accept you
"A visitor from a different world," I concluded.
にわかには受け入れがたいが……不思議と腑に落ちた。: It was hard to suddenly accept, but... strangely, it made sense.
この数日間、案内されて眺めた島の景色……\nおぼろげな記憶にある故郷の風景とは、:
Over the past few days, I've been showing her the sights of the island...
It was completely different from the scenery of my hometown that I vaguely remembered.
生徒会長さんが聞かせてくれる島のお話も、\nわたし達にはわからないことばっかりだ:
The story of the island that the student council president told me about...
It was all things we didn't understand, after all.
こっちの戦術機……ＭＧだとか、学園の話だとか、\nそれにあの妙な穴……何から何ま:
This TSF here... It's MG, and it's talking about the academy
And that strange hole... From start to finish.
……何でこの世界に来たのかさっぱり。: ...I have no idea why I came to this world.
うん……あれから毎日頭を捻ってるのに、\nここへ来たときのことが全然思い出せない:
Yeah... I've been racking my brain every day since then,
I can't remember when I came here at all.
元の世界の記憶も、あんまり思い出せませんし……\nわたし達はこれからどうしたらい:
I don't remember much from my old world, either...
What should we do now?
どうしたもこうしたも、お手上げよ。\n私達の乗ってきた戦術機だって、補給を受けら:
What's the matter? We're out of options.
Even our TSFs can't get resupplied.
機体の現状については、先日あなた達を格納庫に案内して\n直接確認していただいた通:
As for the current state of the aircraft, I took you to the hangar the other day.
It's just as you confirmed directly.
その節は無理を言ってすまなかった。\nそちら側にも事情があるだろうに。:
I'm sorry for asking the impossible of you back then.
I'm sure you've got your reasons.
生徒会の監視下で動いてくださる限り、\nこちらも可能な限りは支援を致します。:
As long as you act under the student council's watchful eye,
We'll support you as much as we can.
……もう一度あのメイズとやらに潜れば、\n記憶を取り戻すための手掛かりが見つかる:
...If I dive into that so-called Mayse again,
I thought I'd find a clue to get my memories back, but...
格納庫に保管してもらってたオレ達の戦術機はガタが来てた。\nあの状態じゃ、あの場:
Our TSFs, which were stored in the hangar, were in shambles.
In that state, it'll be hard to dive into that place again.
おまけにタケルちゃんは操縦ができなくなっちゃって、\nすっかりみんなの足手まとい:
On top of that, Takeru-chan couldn't pilot it anymore
You're holding everyone back, aren't you?
お前な。人が今１番言われたくないことをズケズケと……: You're the last person I want to hear that from right now...
やはり、白銀さんの症状に根本的な改善は見られなかったのですね？: As I thought, there was no fundamental improvement in Shirogane-san's condition, right?
ああ。おかげさまで体調はすっかり戻ったはずなんだが……: Yeah. Thanks to you, I should be feeling better now...
格納庫で不知火の操縦席に座ったら、\nまたひどい頭痛と目眩に襲われちまったんだ。:
I sat in the Shiranui pilot seat in the hangar, and...
I was assaulted by a terrible headache and dizziness again.
白銀さんだけに見られた体質の異変についても鋭意調査中ですが、\n現段階で断言でき:
We're also conducting a sharp investigation into the abnormality of the body that only Shirogane-san saw, but...
I can't say for sure at this stage.
メイズシンドロームの深刻な後遺症の一種……\nあるいは『こちら側』に迷い込んだ影:
It's a kind of serious aftereffect of the Maze Syndrome...
Or maybe it's because I wandered into this side.
つまり、何もわからないってことだな。: In other words, we don't know anything.
……もっと壊すのは勘弁な？: ...I don't want to break it more, do I?
あー！ なんなの、その言い方！: Ah! What's with the way you're talking!
いえ。\nそれで、あなた達の機体についてですが――:
No.
So, as for your aircraft...
おそらく修復は可能ではないかと、\nスタッフから報告を受けています。:
I think it's probably possible to repair it,
I've received a report from the staff.
ただし、問題がいくつか。: However, there are a few problems.
……やはり、そう簡単にはいかぬか。: ...So it won't be that easy after all.
まずは先ほどもお伝えしたように、\nＭＧとは技術・素材が異なるため完全な修理は難:
First, as I told you earlier...
The technology and materials are different from MG's, so complete repairs will be difficult.
そして、ふたつめの問題。\nこちらはより深刻ですが……リソースの不足です。:
And then there was the second problem.
This is more serious, but... we're short on resources.
実際に使用可能かどうか検証に必要なものも含め、\n修理班がリストアップした資材を:
Including what we need to test to see if it's actually usable
I checked the materials listed by the repair team, but—
残念ながら、学園内ですべてを揃えることは叶いません。\n通常では使わない特殊な素:
Unfortunately, we won't be able to gather everything within the academy grounds.
There are a lot of special materials on the list that we don't normally use.
……学園内で揃えられないという事は、\n学園外でなら入手可能ということか？:
...The fact that we can't get them all together on campus means...
Does that mean you can get it outside of school?
はい、お察しの通りです。\nですが生徒会の名義で手に入れる事は不可能です。:
Yes, as you can guess.
However, it is impossible to obtain it in the name of the student council.
いくつか理由がありますが……一番大きな理由は、\n普段使わない資材を我々が集めて:
There are several reasons... but the biggest reason is...
Because we don't want them to know that we're collecting materials that we don't normally use.
生徒会の権力や技術を狙う組織もいます。そんな彼らが、\n生徒会が秘密裏に新ＭＧの:
There are organizations that are after the power and skills of the student council. And that's how they...
Isn't the student council building new MGs in secret?
そんな疑念を持てば様々な勢力からの探りが強まり、\n異世界からの来訪者の情報が洩:
If they harbored such doubts, they would be probed by various forces
It also increases the possibility of information leaking about visitors from another world.
そのため、冥夜さん達の存在を外部へ隠す意図も兼ねて、\n外部からいくつかの窓口を:
For that reason, she also intended to hide Meiya-san and the others from the outside world
We used some of the windows from the outside to order materials.
その資材の受け取りはあなた達に行っていただきたい。\n生徒会の人間が動くと繋がり:
I'd like you to go pick up the materials.
If a member of the Student Council makes a move, the connection could be exposed.
――もしかして、その手伝いとして俺達も同席させたのか？: ――Could it be that she let us be there to help her?
ええ。%usernameusernameuserna%さん達には\n冥夜さんたち:
Yes. To %usernameusernameuserna% and the others.
I'd like you to show Meiya-san and the others to Scara.
えーっと、地図を貰えればわたし達だけでも行けるよ？: Let's see, if you give us a map, we can go on our own, you know?
確かに私達よりよっぽど地理に明るいだろうが、\nわざわざ彼らに時間を割かせるほど:
It's true that she's much more knowledgeable about geography than we are, but...
It's not enough to make them waste their time, is it?
いえ、トラブルが予想されます。\nそのため信頼のできる方々のフォローが必須なので:
No, there will be trouble.
That's why we need to support those we can trust.
端的に言うと、非合法なルートを利用しましたので。: To put it bluntly, we used an illegal route.
生徒会の関与が知られれば、大きな問題になるでしょう。\nこれが生徒会名義の使えな:
If word gets out about the student council's involvement, it'll be a big problem.
This is the second biggest reason why we can't use the student council name.
資材を用意した業者達は、\n真の依頼者が生徒会だとは全く思っていないでしょうね。:
The contractors who had prepared the materials...
They probably don't think the real client is the Student Council at all.
余計に物騒な言い方になったぞ……: You're making it sound even more dangerous...
もしかしてお遣いって、\nすごく危険な場所に行くことになるんじゃ……:
Could it be that she's spending money...
It's going to be a really dangerous place...
建造素材の受け取り先は、スカラ校舎。\nそのブラックマーケットに点在する商店です:
The building materials were received from the Scara school building.
Shops dotting the black market.
……なるほど、納得した。\nブラックマーケットなんて取り締まりの対象だよな。:
...I see. That makes sense.
The black market is the target of crackdown.
その通りです。事実、何度も摘発していますからね。\nブラックマーケットの人達は生:
That's right. We've uncovered it many times, after all.
The people of the Black Market are wary of the student council.
これも生徒会名義で資材集めができなかった理由の一つです。: This is one of the reasons we couldn't gather materials under the student council's name.
だから生徒会は表立って動けないと……\nじゃあ、めるはともかく、俺が顔を出すのも:
That's why the student council can't act openly...
Then, putting Meguru aside, wouldn't it be bad for me to show up?
その点についてはご安心を。\n彼らと直接コンタクトを取るのは、冥夜さんたちにお願:
Don't worry about that.
I'll ask Meiya-san and the others to contact them directly.
なるほど……非合法な市場であれば相手も深掘りはしてこない。\nそういう意味でも顔:
I see... If it's an illegal market, the other party won't dig too deep.
In that sense, we're the best ones for the job, since we don't know who we are.
スカラ校舎であれば、外部の人間がブラックマーケットへ、\n買い物に来ることもあり:
If it was the Scara school building, outsiders would go to the black market
Sometimes I come shopping.
それに冥夜さん達の格好であれば一見すれば、\nどこかの地域組織に所属する立場ある:
Besides, if Meiya-san and the others were dressed, at a glance...
They'll probably think I'm someone who's in a position to belong to some local organization.
なるほど。生徒会に案内をさせているお客さんと思わせて、\n異世界だの未知の技術を:
I see. She makes me think she's a guest who's letting the student council guide her.
So you're trying to keep people from noticing the other world and the unknown technology?
はい。というわけであなた方には、\n冥夜さん達のサポートをして頂ければと思います:
Yes. That's why, you guys...
I hope you'll support Meiya-san and the others.
そういうことでしたら、喜んで！: If that's the case, I'd be happy to!
話もまとまったことだし、\n早速そのブラックマーケットに出かけるとするか。:
Now that everything's settled,
Let's head out to the black market right away.
申し訳ありませんが、まだ待ってください。\n修理の件でみなさんに伝えるべき問題が:
I'm sorry, but please wait.
There's one more thing I need to tell you about the repairs.
取り寄せた素材のすべてが修復に利用可能かどうか、\n現時点では確証がありません。:
Whether or not all of the materials we ordered could be used to repair it
We don't have any proof at this time.
加えていずれも希少な品……\n直せたとしても半数が限界だろう、とのことです。:
On top of that, they're all rare...
Even if we can fix it, half of them are at their limit.
えっ！？ ６機全部じゃないんですか！？: Huh?! Aren't all six of them?!
未知の技術ですので……修理班も慎重に検討した上での報告です。\n申し訳ないのです:
It's an unknown technology, so... The repair team has carefully considered it and reported it.
I'm sorry, but please understand.
それじゃ、ボク達の不知火５機と冥夜さんの武御雷、\nどれを優先して直してもらうか:
Well then, our five Shiranui and Meiya-san's Takemikazuchi,
I need to figure out which one to fix first...
……半数が限度。: ...Half of them are at their limit.
修理できても最大３機ね……\nつまり、半数は直るまで留守番ってことになるわ。:
Even if it can be repaired, there are up to three of them...
In other words, half of them will stay home until it's fixed.
……あ、あの、空気がピリピリしてきたような……: ...U-Um, the air feels like it's getting tense...
戦争でも始めそうな雰囲気だな。: It looks like a war's about to break out.
そうですか？わたしはそう感じませんけど…。: Really? I don't feel that way...
珍しく同意見ね。\n私は修理する機体をどう決めるのがいいのか考えてたところよ。:
For once, I agree.
I was just thinking about how best to decide on the aircraft to repair.
損傷具合はいずれも同等。\nとなれば誰の機体を直すのが効果的かを考えるべきだが:
The damage is the same for all of them.
If that's the case, then we should think about whose aircraft it would be effective to fix, but...
ここはこの学園にもシミュレーターがあるから、\nシミュレーターの戦績で競いあうの:
This school has a simulator, too, so...
Why don't we compete with each other on the simulator's record?
ずるい！\nそれだとわたしが絶対に勝てないよ～！:
No fair!
If that's the case, I'll never win!
わたしが負けちゃってもいいの？\nタケルちゃんの機体を直してもらえないってことだ:
Is it okay for me to lose?
That means you can't fix Takeru-chan's machine.
何の話……って、純夏が乗るって話か？: What are you talking about......wait, Sumika's going to ride it?
うん！ そうだよ！ だってタケルちゃんの不知火、\nタケルちゃんが乗れないならわ:
Yeah! That's right! Because Takeru-chan's Shiranui,
If Takeru-chan can't ride it, then I should be the one using it!
まあ、あの穴ンなかじゃあオレは操縦できないしな……\nスゲー不安なんだが。:
Well, I can't fly in that hole...
I'm really worried.
できるよ！\nタケルちゃんなんかよりもっと上手くやれるもん！:
I can do it!
I can do better than Takeru-chan!
まあまあ、ふたりともケンカしないで。: Now, now, don't fight, you two.
シミュレーターで揉めるなら、サバイバルテストはどうかな？\nほら、せっかく広い山:
If we're arguing in the simulator, how about a survival test?
Look, it looks like there's a big mountain out there, so maybe a week...
それじゃ鎧衣が有利じゃない。: That wouldn't give Yoroi the advantage.
……どうしても競わないと気が済まないのであれば、\n 受け取りが成功した業者の:
...If you really don't want to compete,
Why don't we decide based on the number of successful suppliers?
発注した材料の受け取り窓口は全部で７か所あります。\n分担していただければ、回収:
There are a total of seven reception windows for the materials I ordered.
If we split it up, we should be able to retrieve it quickly.
お遣いそのものを勝負にするってわけか。\nなるほど、そいつは名案だ。:
So we're going to compete with the errand itself.
I see. That's a good idea.
じゃあ３人ずつの小隊に分かれて、\nどっちが多く材料を引き取れるかで勝負しようぜ:
Then we'll split into platoons of three, one by one
Let's see who can get more ingredients.
３人ずつって……\nもしかして、わたしのこと入れてない！？:
Three at a time...?
Don't tell me she didn't include me!?
別に俺が動けるなら、純夏にする必要はないだろ。: If I can move, there's no need to do it with Sumika.
ふむ、悪くない提案だな。: Hmm, that's not a bad idea.
それじゃ、早速チームを分けましょう。: All right, let's split up the teams.
むむむむっ……！\nわたしも！ わたしも参加するんだからね！:
Mmmmmmm...!
Me too! I'm going to participate too!
ふむ……外野からの意見だが、冥夜さんと武が入るチームは\n分けた方がいいな。流石:
Hmm... It's an opinion from the outfielders, but Meiya-san and Takeshi are on the team.
We'd better split it up. The balance of power is definitely going to tip.
確かにな……なら、純夏を入れてバランスを取るか？: You're right......in that case, should I balance Sumika out?
ちょっと！？\nなんでわたしでバランスが取れる扱いなの！？:
Hey!?
Why are you treating me like I'm balanced?!
タケルちゃんはそうやってすぐわたしのことバカにするけど、\nタケルちゃんだってお:
Takeru-chan always makes fun of me like that,
Takeru-chan's just as stupid as you are!!
める、こういうのには口出さない方がいいぞ。\n下手に口出しすると馬に蹴られるだろ:
Meh, you shouldn't interfere with this kind of thing.
If I messed up, the horse would kick me, after all.
……で、こうなると。: ...So, now that it's come to this...
オレと委員長、彩峰、美琴が同じチーム！\n純夏と冥夜、たまがそっちのチームだ！:
Class Rep, Ayamine, Mikoto, and I are on the same team!
Sumika, Meiya, and Tama are on that team!
ぜーったいタケルちゃんをギャフンと言わせてやるんだから！: I'm definitely going to make Takeru-chan squeal!
……数的不利はあるが、妥当な振り分けか。タケルは良いのか？\nこちらが勝ったらそ:
......they're at a numerical disadvantage, but a reasonable distribution, huh? Are you okay with that, Takeru?
If we win, your aircraft won't be repaired, but...
ああ。修理されてもオレは乗れないんだから構わない。\n……いや、いいことを考えた:
Yeah. Even if it's repaired, I can't ride it, so I don't mind.
...No, I had a good idea! Another condition!
勝ったチームは負けたチームに何かひとつ命令できるのはどうだ？\nどうよ純夏？謝る:
How about the winning team order the losing team to do something?
How about it, Sumika? If you're going to apologize, now's your chance!
それでいいよ！ タケルちゃんには、\nぜーーーったいに負けないもん！:
That's fine! Takeru-chan,
I won't lose to you!
うわぁ、すっかりヒートアップしちゃってるねぇ。: Wow, she's really getting worked up.
全く……とはいえ、勝負ということならそのほうが盛り上がるか。: Honestly... That said, if it's a match, I guess it'll be more exciting.
……そうだ！ ねえねえ、めるちゃん！ ちょっといいかな！: ...That's right! Hey, hey, Mechan! Do you have a moment?!
一緒に協力しよ！ ね？\n仲良くなったし、協力しちゃダメだって言われてないから！:
Let's work together! Okay?
We're friends now, and I wasn't told we shouldn't cooperate!
……まあ、私としてはトラブルにならない範囲であれば、\n協力者を引き入れたり、肩:
...Well, as far as I'm concerned, as long as it doesn't cause any trouble,
I won't deny that I'll draw in collaborators and support them.
ぐっ……ルールの範囲内か……: Guh... It's within the bounds of the rules...
いや、いいのか？\nなんか目的が変わってるような……:
No, are you sure?
It's like our goals have changed...
そうですね……自ら危機に飛び込むのであれば止めますが、\n競い合うなら迅速にお遣:
That's right... If you jump into danger yourself, I'll stop you.
If we're competing, I'm sure we'll be able to finish our errand quickly.
そちらの方が結果的には、お互いに利があるでしょう。\n賭け事はよくありませんが…:
In the end, that would benefit both of us.
It's not a good idea to gamble, but...they're not students.
まあ、生徒会長がそういうならいいんだが……: Well, if that's what the student council president is like...
あ、あの、%usernameusernameuserna%さん……\nその、付い:
U-Um, %usernameusernameuserna%...
Um, could you come with me...?
ん？ いや、それだとさすがに不公平な……: Hm? No, that would be unfair...
そ、その……スカラ校舎には知り合いもいませんし、\n実は地理も詳しくなくて……役:
U-Umm... I don't know anyone in the Scara school building,
Actually, I don't know much about geography... There's a chance I won't be of any use...
……それなら仕方ないか。\nすまん、俺もめるに協力することになった。:
...Then there's no helping it.
I'm sorry, I've decided to help out too.
やった！ 二人も協力してくれるなら百人力だね！: Yay! If the two of you are going to cooperate, we'll need a hundred men!
おい、流石にズルくないか！？\nオレたちに比べてそっちの人数が多くなってるだろ！:
Hey, isn't that cheating?!
There's a lot more of them than we are!
へへーん！ 悔しかったらタケルちゃんも、\n仲の良い人に頼んでみたらいいんじゃな:
Heheh! If you're frustrated, Takeru-chan,
Why don't you ask someone you're close to?
……なんだか、武は純夏さんが絡むと子供っぽくなるな。: ......Takeshi's kind of childish when Sumika-san's involved.
ああ。タケルと鑑はいつもこの調子でな。\n……羨ましい限りだ。:
Yeah. Takeru and Kagami are always like this.
...I'm almost jealous.
ん？ それってどういう……: Hm? What do you mean by that?
そろそろ出発するぞ。\nこれ以上時間をかけても仕方あるまい。:
Let's get going.
There was no point in taking any more time.
冥夜さんの言葉に、二人も喧嘩を止めて、\n全員でスカラ校舎へと向かうのだった。:
At Meiya-san's words, the two of them stopped fighting, too
We all headed for the Scara school building.
